mSNVSAG8jtXOhxeDG.name: Directional
mSNVSAG8jtXOhxeDG.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

me60U3YWp0AIhswdW.name: Tough Skin
me60U3YWp0AIhswdW.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mOylLUB0NVuKV06CV.name: Oxygen Storage
mOylLUB0NVuKV06CV.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mCq7Cf5PM-wEQSsMI.name: Oxygen Storage
mCq7Cf5PM-wEQSsMI.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mGU2FBfbRXxq8RbUW.name: Oxygen Storage
mGU2FBfbRXxq8RbUW.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mfUelKlvgZECINiWs.name: Oxygen Storage
mfUelKlvgZECINiWs.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mZL35iOt-i8Q9Q9b7.name: Oxygen Storage
mZL35iOt-i8Q9Q9b7.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mZhRZGiqXcq4oRrV4.name: Diffuse
mZhRZGiqXcq4oRrV4.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mHsPspcK0c42fKKcK.name: Homogenous
mHsPspcK0c42fKKcK.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

msg52b-KcTOYJirE_.name: No Blood
msg52b-KcTOYJirE_.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

m_UplSqekvpdIcH6J.name: No Brain
m_UplSqekvpdIcH6J.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mgB4Hu4yi_cYa1vNp.name: No Eyes
mgB4Hu4yi_cYa1vNp.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mBlLy94O8_JxjHnCK.name: No Head
mBlLy94O8_JxjHnCK.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mTAfaPt2yWvryA-vo.name: No Neck
mTAfaPt2yWvryA-vo.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mfXYnODYdD2l1EnMO.name: No Vitals
mfXYnODYdD2l1EnMO.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

ms1n2KdonE-cRGzgX.name: Unliving
ms1n2KdonE-cRGzgX.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mBkHiakoxHaRJsuFP.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mbumkXcoF0Xd2ZYlB.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mPvKJzqdUCbG0WYnd.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
